H0.text: There were three major sieges in the Boer War – Mafeking, Kimberley and which other. Bloemfontein

H1.text: There were three major sieges in the Boer War – Mafeking, Kimberley and which other. Pretoria

H2.text: There were three major sieges in the Boer War – Mafeking, Kimberley and which other. Johannesburg

H3.text: There were three major sieges in the Boer War – Mafeking, Kimberley and which other. Ladysmith

A4.text: the Boers mounted preemptive strikes into British-held territory in Natal and the Cape Colony, besieging British garrisons at Ladysmith, Mafeking, and Kimberley
